title: react-scatter-board
desc: a reusable React library for interactive THREE.js 2d/3d scatter plots.

title: GeoDEpy
desc: a Python package implementing the Characteristic Direction, a geometrical approach to differential expression and gene-set enrichment.

title: Hair-GEL
desc: a searchable gene expression library for hair follicles.

title: Principal Angle Enrichment Analysis (PAEA)
desc: Dimensionally reduced multivariate gene set enrichment analysis tool. It uses the geometrical concept of the principal angle to quantify gene-set enrichment.

title: Drug Gene Budger (DGB)
desc: a web-based and mobile application developed to assist investigators in order to prioritize small molecules that are predicted to maximally influence the expression of their target gene of interest.

title: LJP Breast Cancer Network Browser
desc: visualizes thousands of signatures from six breast cancer cell lines treated with ~100 single molecule perturbations, mostly kinase inhibitors.
